snippet: The only officer implicated in the death of Danny Chen, the Chinese-American infantryman who killed himself while he was deployed in Afghanistan, will be dismissed from the military.
abstract: First Lt Daniel L Schwartz, only officer to be implicated in the death of Pvt Danny Chen, Chinese-American soldier from New York City who killed himself while on a military base in Afghanistan, has made a deal with prosecutors; Schwartz will avoid trial but will be dismissed from the military.
lead_paragraph: The only officer implicated in the death of Danny Chen, the Chinese-American infantryman who killed himself while he was deployed in Afghanistan, will be dismissed from the military.

headline.seo: Army Officer Reaches Deal in Private Chen’s Suicide
headline.main: Army Officer Reaches Deal in the Suicide of a Private
headline.print_headline: Army Officer Reaches Deal In the Suicide Of a Private

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
